I was too.ğŸ™‹â€â™‚ï¸ That's why i created this extension ğŸ•º. ğŸ“Œ Why you should consider this: âœª Native chrome tabgroups âœª Your rules - your groups. âœª Auto-group tabs by your rules. âœª Rule recommendations. âœª don't disturb existing setup. âœª Lightweight 15Kb âœª Dark mode âœª Pure & clean code that powers fastest performance. âœª No third-party library used. âœª No tracking & no Ads. ğŸ“Œ == Features == âœ… Automatic group your tabs by your rule: Manual tab grouping is time-consuming and frustrating. Hooray!! you set rules without typing a single word. you can also submit your complex rule request in our google groups and we or someone answers with solutions. âœ… Activate and deactivate rules according to your needs: We surf web for multi-purpose tasks. when you work on project A and project B's rule matched, then you lose your temper.
